[{'Agent': '...and aside from that, do you have any other concerns or inquiries?'}, {'Customer': 'Yes, I do. Would it be possible to change my mailing address? I just moved.'}]

[{'Agent': '...so if you need more time, just let us know. '}, {'Customer': 'Actually, I have a different concern. My last official statement does not reflect the payment I made. Could you look into that?'}]

[{'Agent': "...that's why it's important to keep your payments up-to-date. "}, {'Customer': 'I understand, but my main issue is I’m not getting the statements in the mail. Can you check if my address is correct in your system?'}]
[{'Agent': "...I'm here to help with any questions you have about your account. "}, {'Customer': "Actually, I'd like to talk about options for lowering my interest rate."}]
[{'Agent': "...If there's anything else you need..."}, {'Customer': 'Yes, there is something else. I would like to know how I can refinance my loan.'}]
[{'Agent': '...I hope that clears up any confusion.'}, {'Customer': 'I appreciate it. I have another question though. Can I change my due date?'}]
[{'Agent': '..Would there be anything else you want to discuss?'}, {'Customer': "Not about payments, but I'd like to know how I can avail of the skip-a-payment option?"}]
[{'Agent': '...And with that, do you have any other questions?'}, {'Customer': "I've been getting promotional offers for car insurance. Can you tell me more about it?"}]
[{'Agent': "...But ultimately, it's up to you when you want to pay. "}, {'Customer': "I'm not ready to make a payment yet. I do, however, want to contest a late charge on my account."}]
[{'Agent': '...Is payment the only concern today?'}, {'Customer': "Actually, no. I noticed an unfamiliar charge in my statement. Can you clarify what it's for?"}]
